en.title: Is your {{ session.divorceWho }}'s behaviour still continuing?
en.stillBehaviourContinues: Select Yes if your {{ session.divorceWho }}'s behaviour has continued since you submitted your application for divorce.
en.detailsAboutLastIncidentDate: When did the most recent example take place?
en.detailsAboutLastIncidentDateDetail: If you're not sure of the exact date, use the closest date you remember.

errors.required: Select yes if your {{ session.divorceWho }}'s behaviour still continuing?
errors.requireLastIncidentDate: Please enter a valid date between the date of your marriage and today's date.

lastIncidentDate.dayRequired: Enter the day the last incident happened
lastIncidentDate.monthRequired: Enter the month the last incident happened
lastIncidentDate.yearRequired: Enter the year the last incident happened
